Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you and the unique features it offers, I am extending a special offer to sell it to you at $1350000. This price reflects my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal while maximizing the return on my investment. I look forward to discussing this further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
